title: Message Storage
description: A Simple Message Storage aplication. The message can only be set by the owner. The contract also allows transfer the ownership.

title: Buy me a Coffee
description: This contract allows users to tip the owner of the contract. The project is similar to the buy me a coffee aplication.

title: Crowdfunding
description: This contract is a basic implementation of a crowdfunding platform on the Ethereum blockchain. It allows for the creation and funding of campaigns by multiple users.

title: School Exams
description: This is a set of smart contracts for creating and managing exams on the Ethereum blockchain.

title: Event Tickets
description: This smart contract allows for the creation, management, and purchase of event tickets on the Ethereum blockchain. The contract is made up of two main parts: the Event Factory and the event contract.

title: Yield farming
description: This smart contract system is composed of three main contracts: DaiToken, CustomToken, and TokenFarm...
